author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kinross Announces End Of Regulatory Investigation Of West Africa Operations
text:
Kinross Gold Corp:
* KINROSS ANNOUNCES END OF REGULATORY INVESTIGATION OF WEST AFRICA OPERATIONS
* KINROSS GOLD CORP - ‍AS PART OF SETTLEMENT, CO AGREED TO PAY $950,000 TO SEC AS A CIVIL PENALTY​
* KINROSS GOLD CORP - CO IS “PLEASED” TO RESOLVE MATTER RELATING TO INVESTIGATION OF WEST AFRICA OPERATIONS THROUGH AN AGREED-UPON CEASE AND DESIST ORDER
* KINROSS GOLD - U.S. SEC’S INVESTIGATION OF WEST AFRICA OPERATIONS HAS CONCLUDED WITHOUT ANY MATERIAL ADVERSE EFFECT ON CO’S FINANCIAL POSITION/BUSINESS OPERATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
